title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)  for Beginners
description: Tutorial: # NLP (Natural Language Processing) with Python Agenda Representing text as numerical data Reading a text-based dataset into pandas Vectorizing our dataset Building and evaluating a model Comparing models Examining a model for further insight Practicing this workflow on another dataset Tuning the vectorizer (discussion)  In this notebook we will discuss a higher level overview of the basics of Natural Language Processing, which basically consists of combining machine learning techniques with text, and using math and statistics to get that text in a format that the machine learning algorithms can understand!
